Text.Value: In the box. Follow me, I'll show you!
Were you trying to eat it?
*The rat hisses at you, his eyes flashing distrustfully.*
That's what gluttony will get you.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [S_DEN_Rat] Standing on an open chest, sniff the content of the chest, jumps in an hide <SimonG>
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Plays if player has ever picked up the rune from the potato chest. After node is complete, rat goes into the chest and despawns. When node is flagged, it should be moved above 396e79d7-341a-536e-0b49-96838513928c.

Text.Value: *The rat pauses, gauging whether his chipped tooth is, in fact, life threatening.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [S_DEN_Rat] Rat runs away a little, stops, and looks back at you. <SimonG>

EditorData.NodeContext: Warning the player to get back.

Text.Value: *With an enthusiastic chitter, he urges you to follow.*

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: The rat runs back to the storage area where the potatoes are.

Text.Value: *The rat chitters angrily - whatever broke his tooth is in this room.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [S_DEN_Rat] Rat mimes biting on something, shake his head angreely.<SimonG>

Text.Value: *The rat bristles with an offended hiss.*
It's the front one. I chipped it on the evil thing.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [S_DEN_Rat] Opens his mouth. Closes when he's done talking. <SimonG>

Text.Value: *The rat's eyes soften as he emits a pained squeak.*
Sounds like your problem, not mine.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [S_DEN_Rat] Rat bite in the air, tauting, and tooth hurt <SimonG>

Text.Value: I chipped it on the evil thing. It was horrible.
Wait - you're big. You can get rid of the evil thing!
*His dark eyes stare at you, eager for this danger to be banished.*
The evil thing's in the chest.
*The rat squeaks excitedly - the chest is free from danger once again.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [S_DEN_Rat] Standing on an open chest, sniff the content of the chest, jumps in an hide <SimonG>
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Plays if player has ever picked up the rune from the potato chest. After node is complete, rat goes into the chest and despawns. When node is flagged, it should be moved above 396e79d7-341a-536e-0b49-96838513928c.

Text.Value: Follow me. But be ready for anything.

EditorData.NodeContext: Emphasis on 'anything' - he's warning the player it could get dicy

Text.Value: Maybe. I didn't think it would bite me back.

EditorData.NodeContext: A bit haughty. He was trying to eat it.

Text.Value: *Apparently satisfied, he beckons you with a squeak - follow.*

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: The rat runs back to the storage area where the potatoes are.

Text.Value: Or else, I'll - I'll bite you!
*You realise the source of his discomfort - one of his front teeth is chipped.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [S_DEN_Rat] Opens his mouth. Closes when he's done talking. <SimonG>

Text.Value: The evil thing's gone! Now, where was I...

EditorData.AnimationTags: [S_DEN_Rat] Standing on an open chest, sniff the content of the chest, jumps in an hide <SimonG>
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Plays if player has ever picked up the rune from the potato chest. After node is complete, rat goes into the chest and despawns. When node is flagged, it should be moved above 396e79d7-341a-536e-0b49-96838513928c.

Text.Value: *He relaxes, an appreciative squeak escaping his tiny mouth.*

Synopsis:
This dialogue has two versions: SwA and non-SwA. In the non-SwA version, the rat communicates via squeaks or through the narrator.
In the SwA version, the rat speaks like a human. He can have some rat-like tendencies in hs delivery, but he shouldn't have a squeaky voice or come across comical.

Players encounter the rat in the druid grove. He's in pain, with a chipped tooth. He chipped it on an item in a nearby chest. If players are nice to him, he'll lead them to the chest. If players remove the item, the rat excitedly jumps into the chest.
